Name: Lintel of Shepenwepet Worshiping Amun-Re
Description: Bearing the figure of the goddess Hathor, this lintel is divided into two main scenes. The right-hand one shows Shepenwepet worshiping Amun-Re, who is seated on his throne and wearing his traditional crown. The left-hand scene shows Shepenwepet being embraced by the goddess Mut. The lintel is also inscribed with some vertical hieroglyphic inscriptions giving the name and the titles of Shepenwepet, as well as some wishes that she may have a long life, prosperity, and everlasting happiness.
